title: FreeCodeCamp
description: FreeCodeCamp's brand colors include a diverse palette consisting of shades such as a soft lavender (DBB8FF), a vibrant yellow (F1BE32), a sky blue (99C9FF), a fresh green (ACD157), a deep purple (5A01A7), a rich brown (4D3800), a bold blue (002EAD), and a forest green (00471B). These colors are known from the FreeCodeCamp design style guide available at https://design-style-guide.freecodecamp.org/.
